subject: Golf
PGA Championship
John Deere Classic (Golf)
Scottish Open (Golf)
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: After rupturing a ligament in his left ankle, McIlroy, the world’s No. 1 player, may be unable to defend his British Open title next week at St. Andrews.
snippet: After rupturing a ligament in his left ankle, McIlroy, the world’s No. 1 player, may be unable to defend his British Open title next week at St. Andrews.
